name: Star Buds
description:
Fuse the star buds to collect stars and gain the ability to invert gravity in this short puzzle platformer.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

Up/Space to jump

X to swap character

Z to invert gravity (when fused)

Credits:

Vic - Art, Game Design

Manisha - Programming, Sound Design, Game Design

Oathr- Music  (https://soundcloud.com/oathr-vgm)

Flo & Jon - Game Design, Level Design
